text:
Created attachment 24597
Patch to fix generics in javax packages

Patch to fix generics in javax packages
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: The javax.* packages have to match the specification APIs. We can't add generics if the API doesn't use them (as much as I'd like to).
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
How about applying generics fixes just to internal code and private variables, and using @SuppressWarnings on the rest?

[Or just use @SuppressWarnings throughout]

If so, I can create a new patch.
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> How about applying generics fixes just to internal code and private variables,
> and using @SuppressWarnings on the rest?
+1

> If so, I can create a new patch.
Tx

creator: sebb@apache.org
